net.sf.clickclick.control.panel
Class AbstractTablePanel

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.click.control.AbstractControl
      org.apache.click.control.AbstractContainer
          org.apache.click.control.Panel
              net.sf.clickclick.control.panel.SimplePanel
                  net.sf.clickclick.control.panel.AbstractTablePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.click.Control, org.apache.click.control.Container
Direct Known Subclasses:
DockPanel, HorizontalPanel, VerticalPanel
public abstract class AbstractTablePanel
extends SimplePanel

Provides an abstract Panel that layout its controls inside an HTML table.

Author:
Bob Schellink
See Also:
Serialized Form
